resources.string: The password must be at least 8 characters long and must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, a number and a special character.
Create an account to enjoy the convenience
Follow the instructions to connect your device to your car
Connect your ODB-II device to the ODB port located beneath the dashboard in your car
Turn on Bluetooth on your phone then press Continue
Congratulations! You are now connected to your device!
Oops! Unable to establish a connection with your device.
Connection Error: Unable to establish a connection. Please check your settings and try again.
Connection established! Loading your personal homepage\.\.\.
Color blindness results from retinal cone anomalies, causing difficulties in color perception, including confusion between specific colors or limited color recognition.
